article.headline: Drexel 89, Colgate 84
article.story: HAMILTON, N.Y. (AP) -- Sean Brooks scored 20 points to lead Drexel to a 89-84 win over Colgate Saturday night. Tim Whitworth added 19 points for Drexel (1-1), while Kenell Sanchez and Phil Goss had 15 apiece, and Jeremiah King had 11. Alvin Reed led the Raiders (1-2) with 21 points, while Howard Blue scored 17, Andrew Zidar 16, Mark Linebaugh 13 and Jon Simon 12. Zidar added eight rebounds, and Blue added six, including the 500th of his career. Drexel led the entire game after jumping out to a 7-0 lead. The Dragons extended their lead to 38-28 with 4:40 left in the first half, before the Raiders rallied with nine straight points to trail by one point with 2:34 left. Linebaugh led the nine-point run with five points. After taking a 46-40 halftime lead, Drexel pulled away by as many as 12 points, 82-70, with 3:22 remaining, before Colgate again scored nine straight points to cut the deficit to three with 1:03 to play. Goss hit a jumper and Whitworth hit a pair of free throws to secure the win for the Dragons.
